spiritsExplanation: The workout 'Lake Las Vegas Stern View' is strongly characterized by the 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit, indicated by the title and description which emphasize rowing 'along Lake Las Vegas' and 'mountain views of Nevada.' Such descriptions suggest an outdoor, nature-based experience. The high score of 0.95 reflects the explicit outdoor setting and the focus on environmental enjoyment which are key aspects of the 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit. The 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit is also present but to a lesser extent, inferred from the concept of a 'journey' which could involve smooth and rhythmic motion through scenic views, thus receiving a moderate score of 0.55. The lack of music genre specification limits the confidence in this secondary classification, but the context of a journey suggests coordinated motion. Other spirits were not as relevant, given the simple, exploratory nature of the workout, and the absence of indications for intense, structured, or restorative categories.
